title: Mystique, Vol. 1: Dead Drop Gorgeous
description: Mystique - the sultry mutant shapeshifter, who has stood against the X-Men in battle after battle, is offered the chance at a new life when Professor X recruits her to complete a dangerous mission in Cuba. Can this former mutant-rights terrorist - who can disguise herself as anyone on the planet - be trusted? In this story of international intrigue and redemption, the sexy Mystique may surprise everyone, including herself.Collecting: Mystique 1-6
author: Brian K. Vaughan
